/home/lhc/kokkos-test/pkg/kokkos/install/bin/kokkos_launch_compiler /home/lhc/kokkos-test/pkg/kokkos/install/bin/nvcc_wrapper /usr/bin/c++ /usr/bin/c++ -DKOKKOS_DEPENDENCE -arch=sm_80 CMakeFiles/spmv_perf.dir/spmv_perf.cpp.o CMakeFiles/spmv_perf.dir/src/common.cpp.o CMakeFiles/spmv_perf.dir/src/mmio_highlevel.cpp.o CMakeFiles/spmv_perf.dir/src/msg.cpp.o -o spmv_perf  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda-12.4/lib64 ../pkg/kokkos-kernels/install/lib/libkokkoskernels.a ../pkg/kokkos/install/lib/libkokkoscontainers.a ../pkg/kokkos/install/lib/libkokkoscore.a /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcuda.so /usr/local/cuda-12.4/lib64/libcudart.so -ldl ../pkg/kokkos/install/lib/libkokkossimd.a /usr/local/cuda-12.4/lib64/libcublas.so /usr/local/cuda-12.4/lib64/libcusparse.so /usr/local/cuda-12.4/lib64/libcusolver.so
